content:
1. Visit the MacLaren Art Centre and participate in one of their family-friendly workshops or events.

2. Do some indoor rock climbing at Alt Rock in Barrie.

3. Go bowling at Bowlerama Barrie.

4. Visit Flying Monkeys Craft Brewery and enjoy a brewery tour and tasting (for the parents) while the kids enjoy their root beer.

5. Catch a movie at the Galaxy Cinemas Barrie.

6. Try indoor go-karting at SODI Racing.

7. Visit the Simcoe County Museum and explore the interactive exhibits.

8. Spend a fun-filled day at the Barrie Sports Dome.

9. Play laser tag at Laser Tag Explosion.

10. Visit the Barrie Public Library and participate in their reading programs and activities.
